doctor.name: Dr. D.B. Pal
doctor.info: Dr. D.B. Pal is a Eye Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, DO, MS (EYE). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Ophthalmology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. D.B. Pal at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal is 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: K Jahan Center, House # 106, Sadar Road, Barisal

doctor.name: Dr. S. M. Zahid Hasan
doctor.info: Dr. S. M. Zahid Hasan is a Eye Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Russia), CO (EYE), PhD (EYE). He is a Consultant, Eye at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. S. M. Zahid Hasan at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal is 12pm to 3pm & 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Borna
doctor.info: Dr. Borna is a Eye Specialist in Barisal. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DO (BSMMU), MCPS (EYE). She is a Assistant Professor, Ophthalmology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Borna at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal is 4pm to 6pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. M R Khan Sohan
doctor.info: Dr. M R Khan Sohan is a Eye Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (DU), BCS (Health), DO (BSMMU). He is a Resident Surgeon, Ophthalmology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Rahat Anwar Hospital, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. M R Khan Sohan at Rahat Anwar Hospital, Barisal is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.
